EmailTemplate.subject: Save Now with Our Year-End ADS-B Out Special for Learjet 40/45
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://flightstar.com/]]> THE ADS-B OUT AND 20BR ENGINE UPGRADE AVAILABLE FOR LEARJET 40 and Learjet 45
For a limited time, you can save up to $100,000* with Flightstar’s ADS-B Out STC for Learjet 40 or Learjet 45.Get the latest upgrade available for your Primus 1000 equipped aircraft and choose from one the following options before the end of 2016:
Option #1: ADS-B Out and HAPP Offer
If you’re one of the many Learjet operators still waiting for a solution to meet the ADS-B Out deadline, look no further. With Flightstar’s flexible and affordable ADS-B out upgrade, you’ll receive one of the most cost-effective solutions offered today. And, when you redeem this offer, you’ll receive up to $59,000** off your new or existing Honeywell Avionics Protection Program!
Option #2: ADS-B Out, HAPP Offer and 20BR Engine Upgrade
You didn’t think it could get any better? Well, it just did. When you upgrade your Learjet 40 or 45 with Flightstar’s ADS-B Out STC, you’ll receive the same HAPP offer and a Merchandise Credit Voucher (MCV) for a 20BR engine upgrade! With this upgrade, you’ll experience a better climb, better fuel efficiency and more power from your engine. And, you can save up to $100,000* with option 2 for a limited time.
Contact us today and take advantage of this exclusive offer by December 31, 2016! CONTACT US <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/save-more-with-flightstar-ads-b-out-upgrade]]>
*Savings are only available to Learjet 40 or Learjet 45 operators who use Flightstar’s STC. Customer must have 20AR engine to be eligible. Upon purchase of the Lear 40/45 ADS-B Out upgrade via Flightstar STC, a MCV in the amount of $49,000 will be created and available for use up to 9 months from the ADS-B Out install date. 20BR upgrades to be completed by Bombardier.
** Savings are variable and are based off of flight hours and tier pricing. The 20BR MCV is exclusive to Flightstar’s ADS-B Out STCs.
